sources.title: eHero | Full Action Drama Movie | Sean Astin | ESports!
sources.description:
eHero - A rising gamer faces his greatest challenge as he and his team must overcome a video game superstar to win the ultimate gaming championship.
**This film is under non-exclusive license from Level 33 Entertainment.  All rights reserved**
2018.  Stars: Sean Astin, Chloe Rose, Greg Hovanessian

metadata.Plot: An up-and-coming video gamer faces his greatest challenge yet as he and his team must overcome a fiery gaming superstar, as well as their own battling egos, to win the ultimate video game championship.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Procopio, Frank Procopio, Michael Ray Brown
metadata.Actors: Greg Hovanessian, Tim Progosh, Victor Verbitsky
